code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import styles from'./LifePartnerBlog.module.css';import blogData from'../BlogData';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var LifePartnerBlog=function LifePartnerBlog(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.blogContainer,children:blogData.map(function(blog){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.blogItem,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:blog.image,alt:"Blog ".concat(blog.id),className:styles.blogImage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.textDiv,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:styles.blogTitle,children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:styles.blogParagraph,children:[blog.author," \u2022 ",blog.date," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:styles.blogParagraph,children:[blog.paragraph.split(" ").slice(0,20).join(" "),"..."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Blogs/".concat(blog.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.btn,children:"Read More"})})]},blog.id);})})});};export default LifePartnerBlog;
